st: Har nazar ko ek nazar ki talash hai,
s:
Har nazar ko ek nazar ki talash hai,
Har chehre mein kuchh to ehsah hai,
Aapse dosti hum yun hi nahi kar baithe,
Kya karen hamari pasand hi kuchh KHAAS hai.

st: Muskurana to har ladki ki adaa hai
s:
Muskurana to har ladki ki adaa hai
Muskurana to har ladki ki adaa hai,
Use jo mohabbat samjhe,
Woh sabse bada gadha hai.

st: Chiragon mein agar noor na hota, to tanha dil itna majbur na hota.
s:
Chiragon mein agar noor na hota, to tanha dil itna majbur na hota.
Kasam se hum aapse milne zarur aate, agar aapka aashiyana itni door na hota.

st: Aasman mein kaali ghata chhai hai,
s:
Aasman mein kaali ghata chhai hai,
Aaj fir se gharwali se maar khai hai,
Dil to karta hai...sudhar jaoon magar,
Kamvali aaj fir bheeg ke aai hai...

st: Tere khoobsurat aankhon mein aansoo achche nahin lagte,
s:
Tere khoobsurat aankhon mein aansoo achche nahin lagte,
Chaahe jitnaa bhi roye lekin kabhi sachche nahin lagte.

st: Gori paan na khaya karo, honthon pe laali aati hai,
s:
Gori paan na khaya karo, honthon pe laali aati hai,
Gori paan na khaya karo, honthon pe laali aati hai,
By God, tera wazan dekh ke meri jaan nikal jaati hai.

st: Dhoka mila jab bhi pyar mein,
s:
Dhoka mila jab bhi pyar mein,
Zindgi mein udasi chaa gayi.
Socha tha chhor denge is raah ko,
Kambakht phir ek new number se miss call aa gayi

st: Tujhe pane ke liye kuchh bhi kar sakta hu,
s:
Tujhe pane ke liye kuchh bhi kar sakta hu,
Tere pyar mein jee aur mar sakta hu.
Phir bhi tu nahi mili to koi gham nahi,
Yeh formula dusri pe bhi try kar sakta hu.

st: Tere chehre pe udasi aankhon mein nami hai,
s:
Tere chehre pe udasi aankhon mein nami hai,
Tere chehre pe udasi aankhon mein nami hai,
TATA namak istemal karo kyun ki IODINE ki kami hai..!!

st: Aaj mausam mein ajeeb si baat hai,
s:
Aaj mausam mein ajeeb si baat hai,
Bekabu se hamare khayalaat hain,
Jee chahata hai chura loon aap ko aapse,
Par mummy kehati hai chori karna paap hai.

st: Tum door sahi majboor sahi,
s:
Tum door sahi majboor sahi,
Par yaad tumhari aati hai.
Jab saans wahan par leti ho,
To badboo yahaan tak aati hai.

st: Ansoon tere nikle aur aankhein meri ho,
s:
Ansoon tere nikle aur aankhein meri ho,
Dil tera dhadke aur dhadkane meri ho,
Khuda kare hamaari dosti itni gehri ho,
Ki naukri tum karo aur salary meri ho...

st: Chhup gaya badli mein jaake,
s:
Chhup gaya badli mein jaake,
Chaand bhi sharma gaya.
Chhup gaya badli mein jaake,
Chaand bhi sharma gaya.
Aur aapko dekha to,
Bhooton ko paseena aa gaya.

st: Jab jab ghire badal teri yaad aayi,
s:
Jab jab ghire badal teri yaad aayi,
Jab jhoom ke barsa sawan teri yaad aayi,
Jab-jab mein bhiga teri yaad aayi,
Ab raha nahin jata, Chhatri lauta de Bhai.

st: Tumko dekha to khayaal aaya...
s:
Tumko dekha to khayaal aaya...
Tumko dekha to khayaal aaya...
Tumko dekha to khayaal aaya...
Paglon ke stock mein naya maal aaya.

st: Tumse mil kar ho gaya zindagi se pyar,
s:
Tumse mil kar ho gaya zindagi se pyar,
Ab humein chhod kar mat jana yaar,
Bin tere hum jee na paayenge,
Tum na hoge to hum ULLU kise banayenge

st: Aaj kal tum mushkurati bahut ho,
s:
Aaj kal tum mushkurati bahut ho,
Mere dil ko bhaati bahut ho,
Dil kehta hai le jaaun tumhen dinner pe,
Par suna hai tum khaati bahut ho!

st: Tumhe kya pata ke GUM kya hai,
s:
Tumhe kya pata ke GUM kya hai,
Tumhe kya pata GUM kise kehte hain,
Tum kya jaano GUM kya cheez hain,

Kyonki...
Tumne to hamesha THOOK se hi envelop chipkaya hai.

st: Tu kahe to chaand taare tod du,
s:
Tu kahe to chaand taare tod du,
Tu kahe to bandh darwaaje khol du,
Tu kahe to yeh duniya chhod du,
Tu ek baar haske to dekh mere dost,
Tere saare gande daanton ko tod du.

st: Kadam kadam pe hawa ki aahat ka dhyan rakhna,
s:
Kadam kadam pe hawa ki aahat ka dhyan rakhna,
Mushkil samay mein bhi iss dost ko yaad rakhna.
Hamari yaadon ki khushboo zaroor aayegi,
Tum bus apni naak saaf rakhna.

st: Dekha tujhe to rooh khush ho gayi,
s:
Dekha tujhe to rooh khush ho gayi,
Ek kami thi woh bhi puri ho gayi,
Pagal hain woh log jo kehte hain ki,
Chimpanzi ki aakhri nasal kahin kho gayi!!

st: Tum sada hanste raho.
s:
Tum sada hanste raho.
Muskurate raho.
Khilkhilate raho.
Khush raho.
Sada gungunate raho.
Mera kya hai log tumhe hi pagal samjhenge.

st: Ek geet likha hai,
s:
Ek geet likha hai,
Maine aap ki surat dekh kar,
Us geet ko sangeet diya hai,
Maine aapki muskurahat dekh kar,
Par usse gaana bhool gaya,
Main apki awaaz sun kar.

st: Tere pyaar main kitna intezaar kiya,
s:
Tere pyaar main kitna intezaar kiya,
Tere pyaar main kitna intezaar kiya.
Aur uss intezaar mein na jane kitno se pyaar kiya.

st: Wo pal bhi kya tha,
s:
Wo pal bhi kya tha,
Jab aap ko log kiss pe kiss kiya karte the,
Magar apki phooti kismat to dekho,
Us waqt Aap "HUGGIES" pehna karte the.

st: Dosti ki kadar karte hai hum,
s:
Dosti ki kadar karte hai hum,
Aasma mein sitare hain jitne.
Yakin na ho to call kar ke dekh lo,
Baat karenge aapke mobile mein paise ho jitne.

st: Hum aap ko dekhna chahte hain,
s:
Hum aap ko dekhna chahte hain,
Aap se milna chahte hain,
Par ye log bahut zalim hain,
Mujhe aap se milne nahi dete,
Kehte hain "zoo bandh hai, kal ana".

st: Fizaon mein tum ho,
s:
Fizaon mein tum ho,
Ghataon mein tum ho,
Hawaon mein tum ho,
Baharon mein tum ho,
Dhoop mein tum ho,
Chaon mein tum ho,
Ab tum he batao meri jaan,
Kya tum kisi bhoot se kam ho.

st: Jis taraf dekho apka hi naam hai,
s:
Jis taraf dekho apka hi naam hai,
Jis taraf dekho apka hi naam hai,
Upar likha hai most wanted,
Neeche 25 paise ka inaam hai.

st: Shaam hote hi ye dil udaas hota hai,
s:
Shaam hote hi ye dil udaas hota hai,
Toote khwabon ke siwa kuch na pass hota hai,
Tumahri yaad aise waqt bohat aati hai,
Bandar jab koi aas-paas hota hai.

st: Dil ka ashiyan hum nahi sajate,
s:
Dil ka ashiyan hum nahi sajate,
Bagon me phool hum nahin khilate,
Humari ek pasand se toot jayenge hazaron dil,
Bas Is liye hum girlfriend nahin banate.

st: Hothon se jo chhoo liya,
s:
Hothon se jo chhoo liya,
Uska ehsaas ab tak hai,
Aankhe nam hain, aur sanso mein aag ab tak hai,
Aur kyo na ho... Khayi Bhi to 'HARI Mirchi...' hai.

st: Assi v smart
s:
Assi v smart
Tussi v smart
Aada v rang saaf
Tuada v rang saaf
Bas ik chota jeya farak ae
Asi dil ton saaf
Tusi dimag ton saaf

st: Aasman pe jitne taare hain,
s:
Aasman pe jitne taare hain,
Ankhon mein jitne ishare hain,
Aamardar k jitne kinare hain,
Utne hi screw dheele tumhare hain,

st: Pyar kar to ek se kar,
s:
Pyar kar to ek se kar,
Ho sake to kisi nek se kar,
Jab tak na mile sacha dilbar,
Kam se kam try to har ek se kar.

st: Jab hum roya karenge teri yaden dhoya karenge,
s:
Jab hum roya karenge teri yaden dhoya karenge,
Jab Hum pia karenge tujhe yaad kia karenge,

Agar Hum marr bhi gaye to kya hoga,
YAMRAJ ke Mobille se SMS kia karenge.

st: Aapki charcha hai har gali mein,
s:
Aapki charcha hai har gali mein,
Har ladki ke dil mein aapke liye pyar hai,
Ye koi chmatkar nahi time hi aisa hai,
Kyuki kuchh hi dinon me RAKHI ka tyohar hai.

st: Jab tum angdayi leti ho tho mera dum nikal jata hai
s:
Jab tum angdayi leti ho tho mera dum nikal jata hai
Jab tum angdayi leti ho tho mera dum nikal jata hai
Arey thoda deodrant lagane main tera kya jata hai

st: Dekha tujhe to rooh khush ho gayi,
s:
Dekha tujhe to rooh khush ho gayi,
Ek kami thi vo bhi puri ho gayi,
Pagal hain vo log jo kehte hain ki,
Chimpanzi ki aakhri nasal kahin kho gayi!!
